local_intent: Approach and align to the T-block with tight tolerance after confirming detection, then verify proximity.
assumptions: Using IsAt(t_block) as a proxy that approach/alignment succeeded.
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan segment: DetectObject(t_block) -> ApproachAndAlign(t_block, 0.005, 1200). Provides a minimal verification step before subsequent contact/push actions.
